price: isaafi namoota isa waliin turan doonii guutamte keessatti isaan baraarre
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu waman maʿahu fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
